Projects

Cuantitative research

Early access to higher education in Peru. A predictive approximation using statistical learning tools.

The objective of this research is to build a statistical learning model that allows predicting the probability of early access to higher education for students in the fifth year of secondary education. To achieve this purpose, the Random Forest method will be implemented. The data source is the panel bases of the National Household Survey (Enaho) during the period 2014-2019.

View Project

Qualitative research

Intra-State Conflicts. Notes on the Araucanian conflic in Chile during the period 1997-2022.

The purpose of this text is to approach this conflict in Araucanía from an international security perspective. Specifically, this research seeks to approach the causes, characteristics and implications of this conflict.

View Project
